verbs.description: pipe bomb [V: suspect] cesar sayoc to be held without bail pipe bomb suspect cesar sayoc was ordered held without bail tuesday after a judge heard arguments that the 16 explosive devices he allegedly sent to critics of president donald trump showed he poses a public danger and flight risk cesar sayoc attorney geoffrey berman president donald trump florida magistrate judge robert lehrburger
